content:
GeekBoom Team

GeekBoom is a team that leans towards cybersecurity.

The meaning of GeekBoom: Geek (praise), Boom The explosion sound produced by the collision of thinking (compared to storm, it is also easy to remember.)

Meaning: Condensing the spirit of geeks,thoughts collide like a storm.

We pursue: geek spirit, cutting-edge technology, innovative thinking, and brainstorming.

Core Idea: Open Source | Discussion | Action | ∞

Our recruitment of newcomers is open to the world, ethics and integrity are the only criteria to join us, act now!

TIP

Prepare a copy of your resume, click above to email it to us, and we will contact you as soon as possible.

In this blog we will be updating the following types of content:

  • cyber security
  • Penetration testing
  • code audit
  • Vulnerability recurrence
  • IoT security
  • avoid killing
  • bypass
  • safe shooting range
  • programming
  • Hardware development
  • Security operation and maintenance
  • Service construction
  • Recommended books
    ………

极 客 风 暴 团 队

极客风暴是一个倾向于网络安全的团队。

GeekBoom的含义：Geek 极客（褒义），Boom 思维碰撞产生的爆炸声（相对于storm而言，也是为了好记。）

寓意：凝聚极客精神，如风暴般思维碰撞。

我们追求：极客精神、前沿技术、思维创新、头脑风暴。

核心思想：开源 | 讨论 | 行动 | ∞

我们的招新面向全球，道德和诚信是加入我们的唯一标准，行动起来吧！

提示

准备好你的简历，点击上面的<联系我们>，用邮件发到我们这里，我们会尽快与你联系。

在这个博客里我们将会更新以下类型的内容：

  • 网络安全
  • 渗透测试
  • 代码审计
  • 漏洞复现
  • 物联网安全
  • 免杀
  • 绕过
  • 安全靶场
  • 编程
  • 硬件开发
  • 安全运维
  • 服务搭建
  • 好书推荐
    ………
